long_description: The Armpocket i-30 Xtreme armband securely holds your phone or MP3 player while training, and offers 3 pockets to stow your small essentials. Ergonomic design and memory foam padding resist slipping for a secure fit. Touch-sensitive window lets you use your smartphone or MP3 player while it's in the armband. 3 storage pockets fit your keys, gel packs, credit and ID cards, making this armband a great choice for marathon training, hiking and other long-distance pursuits. Medium fits arms with a circumference of 10 - 14 in.; vented arm strap for comfortable, extended wear. The Armpocket i-30 Armband fits the iPhone 5, Samsung Galaxy S III and other phones up to 5.5 in. long.
short_description: The Armpocket i-30 Xtreme armband securely holds your phone or MP3 player while training, and offers 3 pockets to stow your small essentials.
